Material used.Description: Larval and adult Drosophila melanogaster were used in the experiments.

Readout description.Result Description: DAPI staining shows muscle fiber disarray in larvae carrying the NM_001123198:c.1234A>G mutation.
Muscle fiber size is reduced in adults carrying the NM_001123198:c.1567C>T mutation, but less severe than with the c.1234A>G mutation.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were performed with at least n=3 independent lines.

Technical replicates.Description: Images were acquired with at least n=3 technical replicates.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type Drosophila melanogaster were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Genetically similar, but functionally proven negative control lines were used.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA followed by post hoc Tukey test.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Muscle fiber diameters within a defined range based on wild-type controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Muscle fiber diameters greater than two standard deviations from the mean of wild-type controls.
